description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Scenery of the Dee, with pen and pencil. Illustrated by A. Gibb ..., further illustrated and described by J. M. H" Author: HAY, J. Marley. Contributor: GIBB, Andrew. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.g.13." Page: 62 Place of Publishing: Aberdeen Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: Gibb & Hay Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001624156 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue.
